feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: I am a Ph.D. student in School of Electrical and Computer Engineering at Purdue University, supervised by Prof. Y. Charlie Hu. I am interested in mobile systems, edge computing, and computer networks. My current research focuses on understanding and improve the performance of edge-assisted AR systems. I received my B.E. in Computer Science and Technology from University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2018.
